code: import{useNavigate}from"react-router-dom";import"./Pqq.css";import{useLanguage}from'../context/LanguageContext';import translations from'../utils/translations';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Pqq=_ref=>{let{className=""}=_ref;const navigate=useNavigate();const{language}=useLanguage();const handleButtonClick=()=>{navigate("/appointment");};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("section",{className:"pqq ".concat(className),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"testimonial-background"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"testimonial-content1",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"testimonial-quote",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"we-help-you-with-quality-legal-wrapper",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"we-help-you1",children:translations[language].bookAnAppointment})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"lorem-ipsum-dolor9",children:translations[language].dontLetWorst})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"testimonial-button",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"button-content",onClick:handleButtonClick,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"get-started2",children:translations[language].bookAnAppointment})})})]})]});};export default Pqq;
